text: The 2020 Jolo bombings occurred on August 24, 2020, when suicide bombers of Abu Sayyaf jihadists attacked Jolo, Sulu, Philippines, killing 14 people and wounding 75 others. The first attack happened as army personnel were assisting in carrying out COVID-19 humanitarian efforts. The second, a suicide bombing, was carried out near the Our Lady of Mount Carmel Cathedral. ==References== Category:2020s explosions in Asia Category:2020s murders in Asia Category:2020 in the Philippines Category:August 2020 events Category:Explosions in 2020 Category:Islamic State Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in Asia Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in the 2020s Category:Mass murder in 2020 Category:Mass murder in Asia Category:Suicide bombings in Asia Category:Suicide bombings in the 2020s Category:Terrorist incidents in Asia in 2020 Category:Sulu
title: 2020 Jolo bombings
